name: portsyncro
description: Portfolio management app with demo account support. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_EMAIL and NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO_PASSWORD for demo login feature.

scripts.build:prod: npm run check-env && npm run security-check && next build
scripts.start:prod: npm run check-env && npm run security-check && next start
scripts.security-audit: npm run vulnerability-check && npm run security-check
scripts.upgrade-security: npm run replace-logs && npm run security-audit
